game_description: Have you ever dreamt of playing cricket as a Cricketer? CricketR is a Game for you to be the star cricketer. Feel The Crowd, the cheers, the vibe of playing with pro players wearing your favorite jersey. CricketR is an immersive cricket game created just for the cricket lovers to make them experience what it is like to be a Star. Enjoy the crowds roar and cheer leaders dance to your epic shots. Teleport yourself into the shoes of you favirote cricketer and bat your best shorts.
review_1: If you are looking for short cricket matches, this game is good with 2 - 5 overs match. Easy tutorial, Gameplay is good, accuracy of shots is good.
